sentences.english: John got sick last January and has been in bed since then.
sentences.chinese: 約翰於去年一月染疾，現仍臥病不起。

sentences.english: After being sick in bed for a week, Jane still looked pallid .
sentences.chinese: 臥病在牀一星期後，簡的臉色看起來有些蒼白。

sentences.english: The bedridden victim also developed a rash on his chest and belly;
sentences.chinese: 這位受害者臥病在牀，胸部和腹部還出了疹子。

sentences.english: He was in bed with bronchitis.
sentences.chinese: 他患支氣管炎臥病在牀。

sentences.english: When we are bed-ridden, we remind the importance of health.
sentences.chinese: 我們往往只有在臥病在牀時，纔會想到健康的重要。

sentences.english: Helen has been sick in bed for at least two months.
sentences.chinese: 海倫至少已經臥病兩個月了。

sentences.english: I had to take to my bed with a bad cold last week.
sentences.chinese: 上週我重傷風，只好臥病在牀。

sentences.english: After being sick in bed for a week, Jane still looked pallid.
sentences.chinese: 臥病在牀一禮拜後，簡的臉色看起來仍舊有些蒼白。

sentences.english: In 1836, the spirit of complete collapse of the bed for six months.
sentences.chinese: 1836年，精神完全崩潰，臥病在牀六個月。

sentences.english: A case of measles kept him in bed.
Confined to bed (= Because she was confined to bed), she needed to be waited on in everything.
sentences.chinese: 她臥病在牀，什麼事都需要人伺候。

sentences.english: Some people approximately ten went to visit the old teacher ill in bed.
sentences.chinese: 一些人，大約十個吧，去看望了臥病在牀的老教師。

sentences.english: Confined to bed, he needed to be waited on in everything.
sentences.chinese: 由於他臥病在牀，什麼事都需要人伺候。

sentences.english: Confined to bed, she needed to be waited on in everything.
sentences.chinese: 由於臥病在牀，她什麼事都需要人伺侯。

sentences.english: The Minister was sick, and a pastor noted for his neverending sermons agreed to fill in.
sentences.chinese: 本堂牧師臥病在牀，另位牧師同意代講。

sentences.english: The trouble is that my father is ill in bed.
sentences.chinese: 麻煩的是家父正臥病在牀。
